recipe.title: Star-Spangled Fruit Platter Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Put blueberries in a bowl or square container and place on top of a rectangle food tray.
Place watermelon in a row, and then the pretzels until you fill up the platter, alternating red and white.
Bring to your party, serve and, enjoy!
